Greywater Fissure Warband (Age of Sigmar) [1,310pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** (Order - Cities of Sigmar) [1,310pts]

    • Leader [800pts]

      • Anointed on Flamespyre Phoenix [300pts]

        Selections: Flaming Talons

        Categories: MONSTER, ORDER, AELF, Behemoth, CITIES OF SIGMAR, Leader, HERO

        Damage Table: Wound0, Wound1, Wound2, Wound3, Wound4, Wound5, Unit: Flamespyre Phoenix, Unit Abilities: Attuned to Magic, Fly, Phoenix Reborn, Wake of Fire, Weapon: Flaming Talons

        • Anointed [100pts]

          Selections: Great Phoenix Halberd

          Categories: Leader, HERO

          Command Abilities: Captain of the Phoenix Guard, Weapon: Great Phoenix Halberd


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Captain of the Phoenix Guard You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly FLAMESPYRE PHOENIX that includes an Anointed. Until the end of that phase, you can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made by friendly PHOENIX TEMPLE units that are wholly within 12" of that FLAMESPYRE PHOENIX.
        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        Wound0 Wounds SufferedMoveFlaming TalonsWake of Fire
        Wound1 0-216"6D6 mortal wounds
        Wound2 3-414"5D3 mortal wounds
        Wound3 5-712"4D3 mortal wounds
        Wound4 8-910"31 mortal wound
        Wound5 10+8"21 mortal wound
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Flamespyre Phoenix *1285+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Attuned to Magic If a model within 12" of this model successfully casts a spell, whether or not the spell is unbound, roll a dice. If the result if 2 or more, you can add 1 to all save rolls for the Flamespyre Phoenix until your next hero phase.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Phoenix Reborn The first time this model is slain during a battle, roll a dice. On a result of 4 or more, it is reborn with all its wounds restored! Set up the model anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" from the enemy.
        Wake of Fire A Flamespyre Phoenix can attack enemies with a Wake of Fire as it flies over them. To do so, pick one enemy unit that the Flamespyre Phoenix flew over in the movement phase. Then, consult the damage table to how many woulds are inflicted on the unit as they are engulfed in flame.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Flaming Talons Melee2"*4+3+-12
        Great Phoenix Halberd Melee2"43+3+-11

      • Luminark of Hysh with White Battlemage [270pts]

        Selections: Arcane Tools, Searing Beam of Light, Steel-shod Hooves

        Categories: COLLEGIATE ARCANE, HUMAN, LUMINARK OF HYSH, WIZARD, ORDER, Behemoth, CITIES OF SIGMAR, Leader, HERO

        Damage Table: Wounds0, Wounds1, Wounds2, Wounds3, Wounds4, Wounds5, Unit: Luminark of Hysh, Unit Abilities: Aura of Protection, Locus of Hysh, Searing Beam of Light, Weapon: Arcane Tools, Searing Beam of Light, Steel-shod Hooves

        • White Battlemage [60pts]

          Selections: Wizard's Staff

          Categories: Leader, HERO

          Magic: White Battlemage, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Burning Gaze, Mystic Shield, Unit Abilities: White Battlemage, Weapon: Wizard's Staff


        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        Wounds0 Wounds SufferedMoveAura of ProtectionSearing Beam of Light
        Wounds1 0-210"10"2+
        Wounds2 3-49"8"3+
        Wounds3 5-68"6"4+
        Wounds4 7-87"4"5+
        Wounds5 9+6"2"6+D3
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        White Battlemage 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Burning Gaze
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Burning Gaze 6If successfully cast, pick a visible unit within 18". That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Double the number of wounds inflicted if the target has 10 or more models, and triple them if the target has 20 or more.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Luminark of Hysh *1164+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Aura of Protection Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly CITIES OF SIGMAR model within range of the Aura of Protection ability of any friendly LUMINARKS OF HYSH. On a 6+, that wound or mortal wound is negated. The range of the Aura of Protection ability for this model is shown on the damage table.
        Locus of Hysh Add 1 to unbinding rolls for friendly COLLEGIATE ARCANE WIZARDS wholly within 12" of any friendly LUMINARKS OF HYSH.
        Searing Beam of Light Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with this model’s Searing Beam of Light. Instead, pick 1 point on the battlefield within range of this model’s Searing Beam of Light that is visible to this model and draw an imaginary straight line 1mm wide between that point and the closest part of this model’s base. Roll a dice for each unit that has models passed across by this line. For each roll that is equal to or greater than the Searing Beam of Light value shown on this model’s damage table, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        White Battlemage Add 1 to casting rolls for this model if the battle is taking place in Hysh.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Arcane Tools Melee1"45+5+-1
        Searing Beam of Light Missile30"1****
        Steel-shod Hooves Melee1"44+4+-1
        Wizard's Staff Melee2"14+3+-1D3

      • Steam Tank with Commander [230pts]

        Selections: Crushing Wheels, Steam Cannon, Steam Gun

        Categories: HUMAN, IRONWELD ARSENAL, STEAM TANK, WAR MACHINE, ORDER, Behemoth, Leader

        Damage Table: Wound0, Wound1, Wound2, Wound3, Wound4, Wound5, Unit: Steam Tank, Unit Abilities: Bouncing Cannon Balls, Commander, I'll Fix It, More Pressure!, Steel Behemoth, Weapon: Crushing Wheels, Steam Cannon, Steam Gun

        • Commander

          Selections: Long Rifle, Repeater Handgun, Sword or Rod

          Categories: Leader, HERO

          Unit Abilities: Commander, Weapon: Long Rifle, Repeater Handgun, Sword or Rod


        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        Wound0 Wounds SufferedMoveSteam CannonSteam Gun
        Wound1 0-22D6"30"2+
        Wound2 3-42D6"24"3+
        Wound3 5-7D6"18"4+
        Wound4 8-9D6"12"5+
        Wound5 10+D3"6"6+
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Steam Tank *1283+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bouncing Cannon Balls You can add 1 to hit rolls for a Steam Cannon if the target unit has 10 or more models.
        Commander This model can include 1 Commander armed with a Long Rifle, Repeater Handgun, and Sword or Rod. If it does, this unit has the HERO keyword. However, if it does, the Look Out, Sir! rule does not apply to this model, and any command traits or artefacts of power only affect attacks made by the Commander.
        I'll Fix It Instead of using the More Pressure! ability, the Steam Tank Commander can attempt to make repairs to the Steam Tank in your hero phase. If he does, roll a dice; on a 4 or more he repairs one wound.
        More Pressure! At the start of your hero phase, you can choose to overpressure this model’s boiler. If you do so, roll 2D6. If the roll is less than the number of wounds currently allocated to this model, this model immediately suffers D3 mortal wounds.

        If the roll is equal to or greater than the number of wounds currently allocated to this model, until the start of your next hero phase, you can add 2 to this model’s Move characteristic and add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s Steam Gun.
        Steel Behemoth After this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this model and roll a dice. On a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Crushing Wheels Melee1"D64+3+-12

        Steam Cannon Missile*14+2+-2D6

    • Behemoth [170pts]

      • Kharibdyss [170pts]

        Selections: Clawed Limbs, Cruel Goads and Whips, Fanged Tentacles, Spiked Tail

        Categories: AELF, Behemoth, CITIES OF SIGMAR, MONSTER

        Damage Table: Wound0, Wound1, Wound2, Wound3, Wound4, Wound5, Unit: Kharibdyss, Unit Abilities: Abyssal Howl, Feast of Bones, Quick With the Lash, Weapon: Clawed Limbs, Cruel Goads and Whips, Fanged Tentacles, Spiked Tail


        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        Wound0 Wounds SufferedMoveFanged TentaclesSpiked Tail
        Wound1 0-17"62+
        Wound2 2-36"53+
        Wound3 4-55"44+
        Wound4 6-75"35+
        Wound5 8+4"26+
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Kharibdyss *1264+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Abyssal Howl Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units within 12" of any models with this ability.
        Feast of Bones At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that combat phase, you can heal D3 wounds allocated to this model
        Quick With the Lash Before you make a charge roll for this model, you can say that its Handlers are going to apply the lash. If you do so, roll 3D6, remove 1 dice of your choice, and then use the remaining 2D6 to determine the charge roll. However, if the 3D6 roll was a triple, this model suffers 1 mortal wound and it cannot make a charge move in that phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Clawed Limbs Melee1"23+3+-11
        Cruel Goads and Whips Melee2"24+4+-1
        Fanged Tentacles Melee3"*4+3+-12
        Spiked Tail Melee2"D64+*-1

    • Battleline [100pts]

      • Longbeards [100pts]

        Selections: 10 Longbeards [100pts], Ancestral Great Axe, Gromril Shields, Musician, Standard Bearer

        Categories: DUARDIN, LONGBEARDS, DISPOSSESSED, ORDER, Battleline

        Prayer: "I thought duardin were made of sterner stuff!", ‘Put your back into it, beardling!', ‘Too much damned magic flying about these days!’, Unit: Longbeards, Unit Abilities: Gromril Shields, Musician, Old Grumblers, Old Guard, Standard Bearer, Weapon: Ancestral Great Axe


        Prayer Description Ref
        "I thought duardin were made of sterner stuff!" Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly DISPOSSESSED units while they are wholly within 12" of any units with this complaint.
        ‘Put your back into it, beardling!' You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly DISPOSSESSED units while they are wholly within 12" of any units with this complaint.
        ‘Too much damned magic flying about these days!’ A unit with this complaint can attempt to dispel 1 endless spell in your hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Longbeards 4"174+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Gromril Shields Add 1 to save rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target a unit with Gromril Shields.
        Musician 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Musician. Add 1 to run and charge rolls for units that include any Musicians.
        Old Grumblers In your hero phase, you can say that this unit is grumbling. If you do so, pick 1 of the complaints below. That complaint is in effect until the start of your next hero phase. Cities of Sigmar Battletome
        Old Guard 1 model in this unit can be a Old Guard. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapon
        Standard Bearer 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of units that include any Standard Bearers.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Ancestral Great Axe Melee1"13+3+-11

    • Other [240pts]

      • Freeguild Greatswords [140pts]

        Selections: 10 Freeguild Greatswords [140pts], Hornblower, Standard Bearer, Zweihander

        Categories: FREEGUILD GREATSWORDS, HUMAN, FREE PEOPLES, ORDER, Other

        Unit: Freeguild Greatswords, Unit Abilities: Decapitating Swing, Guild Champion, Hornblower, Oathsworn Honour Guard, Standard Bearer, Weapon: Zweihander


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Freeguild Greatswords 5"164+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Decapitating Swing If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Zweihander is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage. Cities of Sigmar Battletome
        Guild Champion 1 model in this unit can be a Guild Champion. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapon
        Hornblower 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run and charge rolls for units that include any Hornblowers.
        Oathsworn Honour Guard Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by this unit if it is wholly within 18" of any friendly FREEGUILD HEROES.
        Standard Bearer 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of units that include any Standard Bearers.

      • Freeguild Pistoliers [100pts]

        Selections: 5 Freeguild Pistoliers [100pts], Brace of Pistols, Repeater Handgun, Stamping Hooves, Trumpeters

        Categories: FREEGUILD PISTOLIERS, HUMAN, FREE PEOPLES, ORDER, Other

        Unit: Freeguild Pistoliers, Unit Abilities: Hail of Bullets, Outrider, Reckless Riders, Trumpeters, Weapon: Brace of Pistols, Repeater Handgun, Stamping Hooves


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Freeguild Pistoliers 12"255+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Hail of Bullets After this unit makes a charge move, it can shoot with any Braces of Pistols it is armed with.
        Outrider 1 model in this unit can be a Outrider. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Sabre and Pistol Butt. In addition, an Outrider can replace their Brace of Pistols with a Repeater Handgun.
        Reckless Riders You can re-roll run and charge rolls for this unit
        Trumpeters 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Trumpeter. Add 1 to charge rolls for units that include any Trumpeters.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Cities of Sigmar

          Selections: Greywater Fastness

          Battle Trait: Amidst the Ghoul Mere, Amplified Sorceries, Home of the Great Ironweld Guilds, Honoured Retinue, Loyal Shields, Rune Lore, Salvo Fire, Stormkeeps, Strongholds of Order, The General's Adjutant, Warriors of the Realms, Wise Council, Prayer: Rune of Unfaltering Aim


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Amidst the Ghoul Mere A Greywater Fastness army must be from Ghyran.
        Amplified Sorceries If a CITIES OF SIGMAR WIZARD successfully casts an endless spell and that spell has any of the abilities listed below, those abilities are in effect for that spell regardless of the realm in which the battle is taking place.

        • Empowered by Aqshy
        • Empowered by Chamon
        • Empowered by Ghur
        • Empowered by Ghyran
        • Empowered by Hysh
        • Empowered by Shyish
        • Empowered by Ulgu
        Home of the Great Ironweld Guilds Increase the Range characteristic of missile weapons used by friendly GREYWATER FASTNESS IRONWELD ARSENAL units by 3" (this does not affect the weapon’s minimum range, if it has one). In addition, if you are fighting a Pitched Battle, you can include 1 additional IRONWELD ARSENAL Artillery unit in your army.
        Honoured Retinue When you choose the general of a Cities of Sigmar army, if the general has a Wounds characteristic of 6 or less, you can pick up to 1 friendly unit to be your general’s retinue. This unit must have between 5 and 20 models. If you pick a retinue, your general gains the Loyal Shields ability.
        Loyal Shields Roll a dice before you allocate a wound or mortal wound to your general while they are within 3" of their retinue. On a 4+, that wound or mortal wound is allocated to the retinue instead of the general
        Rune Lore In your hero phase, 1 friendly GREYWATER FASTNESS RUNELORD can chant the following prayer in addition to any prayer on their warscroll. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1, the prayer is not answered. On a 2+, the prayer is answered.
        Salvo Fire You can use this command ability in your shooting phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly GREYWATER FASTNESS FREEGUILD HANDGUNNERS unit or 1 friendly GREYWATER FASTNESS IRONDRAKES unit wholly within 12" of a friendly GREYWATER FASTNESS HERO. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with missile weapons by that unit until the end of that phase. A unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per phase.
        Stormkeeps 1 in every 4 units in a Cities of Sigmar army can be a STORMCAST ETERNALS unit. Those units gain the CITIES OF SIGMAR keyword and the city keyword chosen for your army.
        Strongholds of Order When you choose a Cities of Sigmar army, you must give it a city keyword from the list below. All CITIES OF SIGMAR units in your army gain that keyword, and you can use the allegiance abilities listed for that city on the pages indicated.

        • HAMMERHAL (pg 64-65)
        • LIVING CITY (pg 66-67)
        • GREYWATER FASTNESS (pg 68-69)
        • PHOENICIUM (pg 70-71)
        • ANVILGARD (pg 72-73)
        • HALLOWHEART (pg 74-75)
        • TEMPEST’S EYE (pg 76-77)

        If a model already has a city keyword on its warscroll, it cannot gain another one. You can still include the model in your army, but you cannot use the allegiance abilities for its city
        The General's Adjutant When you choose the general of a Cities of Sigmar army, if your general has a Wounds characteristic of 6 or less, you can pick up to 1 friendly HERO to be your general’s adjutant. This HERO must have a Wounds characteristic of 6 or less and cannot be your general. If you pick an adjutant, your general gains the Wise Council ability.
        Warriors of the Realms The battle traits for each City of Sigmar will list the Mortal Realm in which the city is located. If you are using the rules from Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Malign Sorcery, your army must be from the same Mortal Realm as the one in which the city is based. In the case of Hammerhal, your army can be from either Aqshy or Ghyran.
        Wise Council At the start of your hero phase, if your general is within 3" of their adjutant, roll a dice. On a 4+, you receive 1 extra command point.
        Prayer Description Ref
        Rune of Unfaltering Aim If this prayer is answered, pick 1 friendly IRONWELD ARSENAL WAR MACHINE unit within 3" of this model. Until the start of your next hero phase, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with missile weapons by that unit.
